tweet: Members of our Minnesota National Guard are deployed to Kuwait, and I was honored to serve their families a meal while they skyped their loved ones during this deployment. As we close out #NationalMilitaryAppreciationMonth, remember to thank service members and their families! pic.twitter.com/Q11GGiQQYw

Every year, I have the honor of nominating outstanding young people to attend our service academies. I was glad to congratulate Riley, Brett, Judson & Roxy in person. They will go on to serve our country proudly. I was just honored to serve them some cake and celebrate with them! pic.twitter.com/UTrda8EWTJ

I will be hosting a town hall in Sauk Rapids on Friday, June 7th at 7pm. I hope you will join me! Visit my website to learn more ↓ https://emmer.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/emmer-announces-benton-county-town-hall …
Today, we remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice to defend our freedoms. They will never be forgotten. We pray for the families who mourn, and our nation mourns with them. #MemorialDay

Today we celebrate the Women’s Suffrage Centennial - where 100 years ago – brave and determined women fought for their right to vote. We honor the work of the original women suffragists who fearlessly brought our country forward. #WomensVote100

161 years ago today, our great state of Minnesota was founded. I am so grateful to represent this wonderful state in Congress, and help Minnesotans prosper. Happy #MNStatehoodDay!
Thank you to America’s military spouses who sacrifice along with our service members. They deserve our gratitude for all they do to support our troops. #MilitarySpouseAppreciationDay

Looking forward to serving on this new #FinTech Task Force! Every day, new technology emerges that will automate and improve the financial services Americans rely on. Today, on National Children’s Mental Health Awareness Day, we recognize the importance of children’s mental health to their development and overall well-being. Thank you to @samhsagov for increasing access to programs and services for our youth and their families.

TONIGHT: Join my staff at the St. Cloud Library from 6PM to 8PM for a U.S. Service Academy Information Night! We are more than happy to address any questions or concerns you have regarding the application process. Call my district office at 763-241-6848 with any questions.
Lowest unemployment rate in 49 years. An average of 218,000 new jobs created every month. The lowest unemployment rate for veterans ever. The economy and #MN06 are booming!

I am the proud co-sponsor of a resolution honoring #NationalDayOfPrayer. The power of prayer is given to all by God, and the freedom of religion is a core American value. Together we can seek peace and prosperity, regardless of our differences.
